about_me.description: I am a dedicated and passionate software developer with a strong foundation in web development and a keen interest in learning new technologies. With experience in various programming languages and frameworks, I strive to create efficient and user-friendly applications. My journey in the tech world began with a fascination for how things work behind the scenes, leading me to pursue a career in software development. I enjoy collaborating with teams to solve complex problems and deliver high-quality solutions that meet user needs.

education.institution: at STEBank Islam Mr. Sjafruddin Prawiranegara

digitalBanking.title: Digital Banking Support System
description: I contributed to the development and maintenance of an internal Digital Banking Support System (ERP) used to support internal banking operations. I was assigned to handle specific parts of the system, with a primary focus on application security improvements and performance optimization.

During my involvement, I successfully improved the application's security posture by addressing vulnerabilities identified through penetration testing. High-severity findings were reduced to 0%, while medium-severity vulnerabilities were also significantly reduced. Additionally, I enhanced application performance by optimizing backend logic and database queries, resulting in faster and more stable data loading.
contributions: Resolved security vulnerabilities based on penetration testing results
Reduced high-severity security findings to 0%
Improved data loading performance through code refactoring and query optimization
Supported ongoing development and maintenance of internal operational modules

akuiNasre.title: AKUI Nasre
description: I contributed to the development of an internal web-based accounting and financial management system for an insurance company. The application was developed as part of a migration from a desktop-based system to a centralized web-based monolithic architecture.

The project was handled by a small team of two developers. My responsibilities included hands-on development as well as coordinating directly with the client to gather requirements and translate business needs into system features. The system helped improve operational efficiency and consistency in managing accounting and financial data.
contributions: Developed and maintained core modules for accounting and financial management
Collaborated closely with the client to define and refine feature requirements
Implemented business logic for financial, investment, and reporting modules
Supported the migration from a desktop-based system to a web-based application

alAmin.title: Al-Amin Insurance Management System
description: I contributed to the redevelopment of an internal web-based management system used by a Sharia insurance company. The project was initiated to improve the performance and maintainability of an existing monolithic application.

The application was part of a technology migration from native PHP to the Laravel framework. I worked in a small team of two developers, focusing on application development and coordinating directly with stakeholders to gather feature requirements. The new system delivered improved performance, cleaner architecture, and better scalability for internal insurance operations.
contributions: Migrated legacy native PHP application to Laravel framework
Improved application performance and code maintainability
Developed core insurance management modules
Implemented authentication and role-based access control (RBAC)
Collaborated with stakeholders to clarify and implement business requirements

posJewelry.title: POS Jewelry Store System
description: I contributed as a Fullstack Developer supporting the development and maintenance of a web-based Point of Sale (POS) system used by a jewelry store to manage daily business operations.

The application was built using a monolithic architecture with Laravel 6. My responsibilities focused on feature enhancements, bug fixes, and deployment to the production server. Although this project was not my primary development focus, I played a key role in ensuring system stability, reliability, and smooth operation.
contributions: Implemented feature enhancements based on business needs
Resolved bugs and maintained application stability
Deployed application updates to the production server
Supported and maintained core POS modules
Assisted in ensuring secure access through authentication and role-based access control

attendanceSystem.title: Web-Based Attendance Management System
description: I worked as a freelance developer on a web-based attendance management system designed to manage attendance data for events as well as daily user check-ins.

The application was built using a monolithic architecture, and I was responsible for continuing the development of an existing codebase. My role focused on fixing bugs, adding new features based on client requirements, and ensuring the system remained stable and reliable for daily use.
contributions: Maintained and enhanced an existing Laravel codebase
Fixed bugs and improved overall application stability
Implemented event-based and daily attendance features
Developed and maintained event and user management modules
Supported authentication and reporting features

electionRecap.title: Election Recap & Vote Monitoring System
description: I worked as a freelance developer on a web-based vote recap and monitoring system designed for internal election result tracking during a national election process.

The application was used by authorized field witnesses to submit and monitor vote data in near real-time. My responsibilities included developing core features such as vote data input, result reporting, and system integration, with a strong focus on data accuracy, access control, and system reliability.
contributions: Developed vote data input and recap modules
Implemented real-time dashboard for vote statistics and monitoring
Built reporting features for internal result analysis
Implemented authentication and role-based access control (RBAC)
Ensured data integrity and secure access for internal users

strp.title: STRP â€“ Stock & Warehouse Management System
description: I contributed as a Fullstack Developer supporting the development of a web-based stock and warehouse management system used to manage inventory and warehouse operations.

The project was developed collaboratively with another developer. My role focused on continuing an existing CodeIgniter 3 codebase, fixing bugs, and implementing small feature enhancements based on tasks assigned by the PMO. Although my responsibilities were limited in scope, I contributed to maintaining system stability and supporting ongoing development.
contributions: Maintained and supported an existing CodeIgniter 3 application
Fixed bugs and resolved minor issues in the inventory system
Implemented small feature enhancements as assigned by the PMO
Collaborated with team members to support ongoing development
Helped ensure system stability and usability

documentDelivery.title: Document Delivery Management System
description: I developed a web-based system designed to facilitate document delivery between citizens and a local civil registry office. The application was built to support courier services responsible for delivering official documents such as national ID cards and child identity cards.

The system allows citizens to submit document delivery requests directly through the platform, helping streamline administrative processes and improve delivery efficiency. As a freelance Fullstack Developer, I handled the entire system development end-to-end, covering both frontend and backend implementation.
contributions: Designed and developed the system end-to-end as a Fullstack Developer
Built public registration and authentication features
Implemented consumer and courier management modules
Supported document delivery request workflows
Improved efficiency and traceability of document distribution
